title: Microsoft c+++ 2005
body: _I have a problem with downloading the lol graphics file the microsoft c+++ 2005 on windows 10 it keeps on telling me that an error has occured can anyone plz help

replies.body: Which source did you download the league client from?  Make sure it's from our official site to make sure it's the most up to date and has the correct files.  If you continue to have issues, go over our [re-installation guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to get this fixed up.  You could also use our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which provides a clean re-install.  I hope that helps!
